				Best planted at soil temperatures between 7°C and 30°C.
Canada - zone 4a Temperate Warm Summer.harvest: Harvest in 10-16 weeks. Cut flowerhead off with a knife..
Canada - zone 4a Temperate Warm Summer.companion:
Compatible with (can grow beside): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, oregano)
Canada - zone 4a Temperate Warm Summer.avoid: Avoid growing close to: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chilli, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

				Best planted at soil temperatures between 8°C and 30°C.
Canada - Zone 3a Temperate Short Summer.companion:
Compatible with (can grow beside): Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, camomile)
Canada - Zone 3a Temperate Short Summer.avoid: Avoid growing close to: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chilli, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

Australia - arid.sowing:
Easy to grow.  Plant pieces of rhizome or roots 8 - 10 cm (3 - 4 in.) deep. 
				Best planted at soil temperatures between 5°C and 20°C.
Australia - arid.harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. You will have a stronger plant if you leave it for about a year before using..

				Best planted at soil temperatures between 5°C and 20°C.
New Zealand - sub-tropical.harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. You will have a stronger plant if you leave it for about a year before using..
